TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed X509KeyUsageFlags extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines how the certificate key can be used. If this value is not defined, the key can be used for any purpose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class is an implementation of a commonly used extension that is mapped by default to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig> file. When the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.Extensions%2A> property of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> class is invoked, this class can be used directly.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageFlags CrlSign = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The key can be used to sign a certificate revocation list (CRL).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageFlags DataEncipherment = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The key can be used for data encryption.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageFlags DecipherOnly = int32(32768)

Docs.summary: The key can be used for decryption only.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageFlags DigitalSignature = int32(128)

Docs.summary: The key can be used as a digital signature.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageFlags EncipherOnly = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The key can be used for encryption only.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageFlags KeyAgreement = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The key can be used to determine key agreement, such as a key created using the Diffie-Hellman key agreement algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageFlags KeyCertSign = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The key can be used to sign certificates.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageFlags KeyEncipherment = int32(32)

Docs.summary: The key can be used for key encryption.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageFlags None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageFlags NonRepudiation = int32(64)

Docs.summary: The key can be used for authentication.
